step.datasource: SELECT MAX(CASE WHEN r.id IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE 1 END) as doQuit FROM (VALUES (0)) l(v) LEFT JOIN dbo._AB_Entity_Log r WITH (NOLOCK) ON r.jobid = '%jobid%' AND r.runid <> '%runid%' AND r.syscreated > DATEADD(HOUR, -2, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP) -- check for max 2 hours back AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM dbo._AB_Entity_Log r1 WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE r1.runid = r.runid AND r1.seqno = -10) -- -10 is 'Finished Running Job'

UPDATE t WITH (ROWLOCK, NOWAIT) SET marked_for_delivery = 1, mfd_date = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP FROM dbo._AB_tb_TransfersAbsenceIdReg t INNER JOIN dbo._AB_sy_absences a WITH (NOLOCK) ON a.ID = t.absenceid AND a.FreeBoolField_01 = 1 WHERE 1=1 AND t.marked_for_delivery = 0
step.stepname: Register new requests that are marked for delivery

step.datasource: WITH req AS ( SELECT t.HID as palletno, t.sales_ordernr as ordernr, t.itemcode, SUM(t.quantity) as req FROM dbo._AB_tb_TransfersOrders t WITH (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN dbo._AB_tb_TransfersAbsenceIdReg r WITH (NOLOCK) ON r.absenceID = t.absenceID WHERE 1=1 AND t.sales_ordernr IS NOT NULL AND r.marked_for_delivery = 1 AND t.rowstatus1 = 0 GROUP BY t.HID, t.sales_ordernr, t.itemcode ) SELECT req.palletno, req.Ordernr, req.Itemcode, req.req as [Required], ISNULL(av.av, 0) as Available , CONCAT(req.Ordernr, req.Itemcode) as ReferenceValue FROM req OUTER APPLY ( SELECT r.artcode, SUM(esr_aantal) as av FROM [dbo].[_AB_sy_orkrg] k WITH (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN [dbo].[_AB_sy_orsrg] r WITH (NOLOCK) ON r.ordernr = k.ordernr WHERE 1=1 AND k.ord_soort = 'V' AND k.ordernr = req.ordernr COLLATE DATABASE_DEFAULT AND r.artcode = req.itemcode COLLATE DATABASE_DEFAULT AND r.ar_soort != 'P' AND r.uitgifte = 0 GROUP BY r.artcode ) av WHERE 1=1 AND ISNULL(av.av, 0) < req.req -- Not send yet AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM [%abeidb%].[dbo].[_AB_Entity_results] r WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE 1=1 AND r.ExactProduct = 'EMAIL' AND r.jobid = %jobid% AND CAST(r.syscreated as date) = CAST(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP as date) AND r.rowstatus = 2 AND r.NewKeyvalue = 'Email send' AND r.ReferenceValue = CONCAT(req.Ordernr, req.Itemcode) )
step.contentbody:
Hello,

There are not enough rows available to complete this delivery. Please add the required rows in the correct order.






palletnoOrdernrItemcodeRequiredAvailable
%palletno%%Ordernr%%Itemcode%%Required%%Available%
 


This email was automatically created by ABEI on %abeinowiso%

run: %runid%

step.datasource: UPDATE t WITH (ROWLOCK, NOWAIT) SET runid1 = '%runid%' , rowstatus1 = 1 , sysmodified = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP FROM dbo._AB_tb_TransfersOrders t WHERE 1=1 AND t.sales_ordernr IS NOT NULL AND t.rowstatus1 = 0 AND t.ID IN ( SELECT TOP (100) t.ID FROM dbo._AB_tb_TransfersOrders t WITH (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN dbo._AB_tb_TransfersAbsenceIdReg r WITH (NOLOCK) ON r.absenceid = t.absenceid AND r.marked_for_delivery = 1 INNER JOIN dbo._AB_sy_orkrg k WITH (NOLOCK) ON k.ordernr = t.sales_ordernr COLLATE DATABASE_DEFAULT AND k.ord_soort = 'V' AND k.afgehandld = 0 WHERE 1=1 AND t.sales_ordernr IS NOT NULL AND t.rowstatus1 = 0 ORDER BY t.absenceid, t.itemcode --t.syscreated, t.ID )
SELECT TOP (1) 0 as doQuit FROM dbo._AB_tb_TransfersOrders r with (nolock) WHERE 1=1 AND r.runid1 = '%runid%'

SELECT r.ordernr as HeaderID, t.ItemCode as artcode, t.quantity as esr_aantal, r.ID, t.ItemNumber as serie_num FROM dbo._AB_tb_TransfersOrders t WITH (NOLOCK) -- Get the first orderline we can use to deliver this CROSS APPLY ( SELECT TOP (1) r.ordernr, r.ID FROM dbo._AB_sy_orsrg r WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE 1=1 AND r.ordernr = t.sales_ordernr COLLATE DATABASE_DEFAULT AND r.artcode = t.ItemCode COLLATE DATABASE_DEFAULT AND r.uitgifte = 0 -- Not delivered yet ORDER BY r.regel ) r WHERE 1=1 AND t.runid1 = '%runid%' AND t.rowstatus1 = 1
step.stepname: SDK Fulfillment Line (set target to Globe)

step.datasource: SELECT DISTINCT k.ordernr as HeaderID, k.ordernr as ordernr , 1 as InvoiceGenerate -- Generate invoice , k.magcode , 2 as PrintDestination -- Don't print , 'PAKBON' as PrintLayout FROM dbo._AB_tb_TransfersOrders t WITH (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN dbo._AB_sy_orkrg k WITH (NOLOCK) ON k.ordernr = t.sales_ordernr COLLATE DATABASE_DEFAULT AND k.ord_soort = 'V' AND k.afgehandld = 0 WHERE 1=1 AND t.runid1 = '%runid%' AND t.rowstatus1 = 1
step.stepname: SDK Fulfillment Header (set target to Globe)

step.datasource: UPDATE t WITH (ROWLOCK, NOWAIT) SET rowstatus1 = CASE WHEN ISNULL(g.Qty, 0) >= t.quantity THEN 2 ELSE -1 END , errormessage1 = CASE WHEN ISNULL(g.Qty, 0) < t.quantity THEN CONCAT('No delivery found, q:', ISNULL(g.Qty, 0)) END , sysmodified = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP FROM dbo._AB_tb_TransfersOrders t LEFT JOIN ( SELECT g.bkstnr_sub as ordernr, g.artcode, g.facode--, g.datum as afldat , SUM(-1*g.aantal) as Qty--, g.Faktuurnr as OurRef, g.docnumber AS yourref, g.bkstnr AS entryno FROM dbo._AB_sy_gbkmut g WITH (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN dbo._AB_sy_Items i WITH (NOLOCK) ON i.ItemCode = g.artcode AND i.GLAccountDistribution = g.reknr WHERE 1=1 AND g.transtype IN ('N', 'C', 'P') AND g.transsubtype = 'B' --AND g.bkstnr_sub = t.sales_ordernr COLLATE DATABASE_DEFAULT --AND g.artcode = t.ItemCode COLLATE DATABASE_DEFAULT -- We need a date filter, otherwise this takes forever; take yesterday too in case we process from 12 - 1 AND g.datum IN (CAST(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP as date), CAST(DATEADD(DAY, -1, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP) as date)) GROUP BY g.bkstnr_sub, g.artcode, g.facode ) g ON g.ordernr = t.sales_ordernr COLLATE DATABASE_DEFAULT AND g.artcode = t.itemcode COLLATE DATABASE_DEFAULT AND (t.isSerialNumberItem = 0 OR (t.isSerialNumberItem = 1 AND g.facode = t.ItemNumber COLLATE DATABASE_DEFAULT)) WHERE 1=1 AND t.runid1 = '%runid%' AND t.rowstatus1 = 1

UPDATE t WITH (ROWLOCK, NOWAIT) SET rowstatus1 = 0 , retrycounter1 = t.retrycounter1 + 1 FROM dbo._AB_tb_TransfersOrders t WHERE 1=1 AND t.runid1 = '%runid%' AND t.rowstatus1 <> 2 AND t.retrycounter1 < 5

SELECT HID as Pallet_no, t.ItemCode, t.ItemNumber, t.Quantity, t.Sales_ordernr, t.errormessage1 as [Message] FROM dbo._AB_tb_TransfersOrders t WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE 1=1 AND t.runid1 = '%runid%' AND t.rowstatus1 = -1 -- errors
step.contentbody:
Hello,

Following pallet lines could not be delivered automatically, please deliver them by hand:





Pallet_noItemCodeItemNumberQuantitySales_ordernrMessage
%Pallet_no%%ItemCode%%ItemNumber%%Quantity%%Sales_ordernr%%Message%
 



This email was automatically created by ABEI on %abeinowiso%

run: %runid%
step.settings: retryunique=0;uniquekey=;emailfrom=abei@orlaco.com;emailname=ABEI @ ES01;emailreplyto=lennart.meeuse@stoneridge.com;emailuser=;emailpwd=TFEEY7QNB86Yzc1ll50jtg%equalchar%%equalchar%;emailserver=smtpinternal.stoneridge.com;emailport=25;emailssl=False;emailto=a.dusschoten@orlaco.com%semicolon%j.molen@orlaco.com%semicolon%E.Elings@orlaco.com%semicolon%lennart.meeuse@stoneridge.com%semicolon%Martien.Bakkenes@stoneridge.com%semicolon%logisticscontrol@orlaco.com;emailcc=;emailbcc=;emailsub=Delivery - Actions required for Transfer orders pallet no %Pallet_no%;emailbodyusesource=0;emailsendifnoresults=0;emailcontentcolumns=Pallet_no,ItemCode,ItemNumber,Quantity,Sales_ordernr,Message;mex_connectionid=0;emailsplitcolumn=Pallet_no;

step.datasource: SELECT DISTINCT t.HID as Pallet_no, t.Sales_ordernr FROM dbo._AB_tb_TransfersOrders t WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE 1=1 AND t.runid1 = '%runid%' AND t.rowstatus1 = 2 AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM dbo._AB_tb_TransfersOrders t1 WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE t1.absenceid = t.absenceid AND t1.rowstatus1 <> 2)
step.contentbody:
Hello,

The delivery for pallet %Pallet_no% is finished.

Ordernumber: %Sales_ordernr%


This email was automatically created by ABEI on %abeinowiso%

run: %runid%
